name: document-understanding-solution-demo
description: A web app and Cloud Formation template that demonstrates the capabilities of the Amazon Textract, Comprehend and Comprehend Medical.

scripts.bootstrap: AWS_REGION=$npm_package_stack_region USER_EMAIL=$npm_package_email SEARCH_MODE=$npm_package_searchMode  cdk bootstrap --toolkit-stack-name DocumentUnderstandingCDKToolkit
scripts.deploy:backend: ISCICD=$npm_package_cicd SEARCH_MODE=$npm_package_searchMode ENABLE_BARCODES=$npm_package_enableBarcodes STACKNAME=$npm_package_stack_stackname AWS_REGION=$npm_package_stack_region USER_EMAIL=$npm_package_email cdk deploy --toolkit-stack-name DocumentUnderstandingCDKToolkit --require-approval never -v true
scripts.deploy:client: yarn export && yarn update-es-logs-and-stack-variables && AWS_REGION=$npm_package_stack_region STACKNAME=$npm_package_stack_stackname cdk deploy --toolkit-stack-name DocumentUnderstandingCDKToolkit --require-approval never -v true -a "node bin/deploy-client-stack.js"
scripts.deploy-all: yarn add-service-linked-role && yarn run:tests && yarn compile-ts-stacks && yarn bootstrap && yarn deploy:backend && yarn deploy:client && yarn deploy:setup-samples
scripts.deploy: yarn install-all && yarn deploy-all && yarn update-pdf-lambda-code
scripts.destroy: STACKNAME=$npm_package_stack_stackname ENABLE_BARCODES=$npm_package_enableBarcodes AWS_REGION=$npm_package_stack_region cdk destroy -v true -a "node bin/deploy-client-stack.js" && STACKNAME=$npm_package_stack_stackname ENABLE_BARCODES=$npm_package_enableBarcodes AWS_REGION=$npm_package_stack_region USER_EMAIL=$npm_package_email cdk destroy -v true
scripts.build: STACKNAME=$npm_package_stack_stackname AWS_REGION=$npm_package_stack_region SEARCH_MODE=$npm_package_searchMode yarn pre-build && NEXT_PUBLIC_SEARCH_MODE=$npm_package_searchMode NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_COMPREHEND_MEDICAL=$npm_package_enableComprehendMedical NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_BARCODES=$npm_package_enableBarcodes next build app --debug
